subject: Re: Order #SSN5459 confirmed
description_text:
Hello, good morning, 
 
 I have just placed an order, and I realized afterwards that I did not include the haptic vibration system. 
 
 I would like to know if it is still possible to add the haptic vibration system to my order so that the setup is complete. Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could inform me about the estimated delivery schedule for this order. 
 
 Thank you very much for your help. 
 
 Kind regards, Sent by my iPhone Missatge enviat per SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> el dia 28 des. 2025 a les 21:34: ﻿
 
 









 
 
  
    Thank you for your purchase!
